profile.name: Vishal Munday
profile.title: Backend Developer
profile.intro: Hi, I'm Vishal, a backend developer with 3 years of experience. I specialize in building robust and scalable server-side and Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) applications.
profile.bio: I'm passionate about creating efficient backend solutions that power modern web applications. With a strong foundation in server-side technologies like Node.js, Express, and databases, I enjoy solving complex problems and optimizing performance. Recently, I've been working on Generative AI and Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) applications using tools like LangChain, LangGraph, and vector embeddings to build intelligent, real-world AI systems.

experience.description: Developing and maintaining server-side applications. Working with Node.js, Express, and various databases to create scalable API solutions.
Started as a junior developer working on various backend tasks and gradually taking on more responsibility.

education.description: Studied computer science with focus on software development and databases.
Completed my secondary education with a focus on core subjects.

projects.title: Alma Nilokheri
projects.description: A dedicated platform for Alma Nilokheri College, designed to connect alumni with their alma mater. This website fosters networking, collaboration, and a sense of community among past and present students.

projects.title: Admit Easy
projects.description: A seamless college admission platform built to bridge the gap between students and colleges. Admit Easy simplifies the admission process, making it more accessible and hassle-free.

projects.title: Kiki – AI-Powered Chat & Music Generation
projects.description: An advanced AI application featuring an interactive chatbot, music generation capabilities, and more. Kiki brings AI-driven creativity and intelligent conversation to your fingertips.

projects.title: Vercel Clone
projects.description: A fully functional Vercel clone built using Next.js and Tailwind CSS, providing seamless project deployment and management features.

projects.title: Spotify Clone
projects.description: A high-fidelity Spotify clone built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS, offering a sleek music streaming experience with authentication and playlist management.

projects.title: bnbMEhome
projects.description: Full-service property management system. Messaging integrations (Airbnb, PMS, Respond.io), inventory & booking management, AI agent 'HostBuddy', approval flows, AI image optimizer, ETL calculator.

projects.title: EasySupply
projects.description: Luxury supply chain project. Automated order processing, AI line sheet extractor, discrepancy identification, ledger & approval flow management.

projects.title: Aaxel Insurance
projects.description: Insurance platform. CSIO integration, AI reconciliation, GL master flow, accounting workflows.

projects.title: Task & Expense
projects.description: Internal hybrid project of Jira, ClickUp, and Zoho for task & expense management. Internal project, no public demo.

testimonials.name: Tejpal Chawala
testimonials.content: I am pleased to recommend Vishal Munday, a talented professional and a fellow alumnus from our college GBN Govt. Polytechnic Nilokheri-Karnal. Vishal is highly proficient in development and coding, with a deep understanding of modern programming languages and frameworks. Vishal's alumni portal not only strengthened connections within our community but also demonstrated his commitment to impactful projects. His dedication to delivering high-quality results, coupled with his collaborative approach, makes him an asset to any team.I am confident that Vishal’s technical expertise and innovative thinking will enable him to excel in any development or coding role he pursues.

testimonials.name: Sarah Johnson
testimonials.content: Working with Vishal was a game-changer for our project. He delivered everything on time and his technical skills are outstanding.
